title: Luca Alioto
text:
Bio
Iâ€™m an associate professor of political science at The University of California, Davis where I research and teach on security, development, and research methods. In my research I often work with governments, international donors, and their implementing partners to improve the design and evaluation of development programming around the world.
I was born in Cali, Colombia, grew up in Cali/South Florida, and have lived in Texas, North Carolina, South Carolina, and now California.


Education


{{< fa graduation-cap >}} PhD in Political Science, 2019 | Duke University


{{< fa graduation-cap >}} MA in Political Science, 2016 | Duke University


{{< fa graduation-cap >}} BA in Political Science, 2013 | University of Florida




Research interests
Armed conflict | Development
